name: .RPA File Extension
summary: Learn about .RPA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by iTWO, a construction planning and engineering software package; contains an archive of a Progress ObjectStore database, which is the backend storage format for iTWO project data; used for creating backups as well as archiving projects.

content: RPA files are backup copies of the data stored in .RPD files. If a user saves the database in iTWO, the RPD data is archived into the resulting RPA file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
